articles.author: DAVID KLEPPER
articles.title: FBI tells telecom firms to boost security following wide-ranging Chinese hacking campaign - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. officials are urging telecommunication companies to boost network security following a Chinese hacking operation that gave officials in Beijing access to the private texts and phone conversations of Americans. The warning issued Tuesday by the FBI and th…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Federal authorities on Tuesday urged telecommunication companies to boost network security following a sprawling Chinese hacking campaign that gave officials in Beijing access to priv… [+4143 chars]
